# Step-Up — Generative Engine Optimization Map

> A fitness and wellness business.

---

## Pages

### Home
https://step-up-26b074e1.zappy5.app
Build strength, fuel smart, and track every win. The complete system for athletes who want real progress—not just workouts.

### Training
https://step-up-26b074e1.zappy5.app/training
Progressive training programs that build strength, endurance, and mobility. Designed for all levels from beginner to athlete.

### Nutrition
https://step-up-26b074e1.zappy5.app/nutrition
Smart nutrition made simple. Learn the 50/25/25 plate method, daily targets, and flexible eating strategies for athletic performance.

### Plans
https://step-up-26b074e1.zappy5.app/plans
Flexible training plans for every athlete. Start with a free week or upgrade to monthly for advanced features. No contracts, cancel anytime.

### About
https://step-up-26b074e1.zappy5.app/about
Meet the team behind Step-Up. We believe in progress over perfection, building sustainable training habits for athletes of all levels.

### Contact
https://step-up-26b074e1.zappy5.app/contact
Have questions about training, nutrition, or plans? Contact Step-Up and we'll respond within 24 hours. We're here to help you succeed.
